Next Space Setup.code:
; NAME: Next Space Setup
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Next
; PARAM: Space|Prev

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

LI A0 -1
ADDIU A1 R0 Next_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Next_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2

LI A0 -1
ADDIU A1 R0 Prev_chain_index
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Prev_chain_space_index

LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Ice Flower.code:
; NAME: Ice Flower
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)

; S0 = Coins to Lose
; S1 = Current Player Index

LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x1EB ; or 1FD?

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S1 V0
MOVE A0 S1
LUI T1 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_char) ; Load Player 1's Character address
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Character address
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get current Player's Star address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into S2

ADDIU V0 T0 0x287 ; Mario's Despair Index

JAL PlaySound
MOVE A0 V0

;JAL SleepProcess
;LI A0 30 ; Sleep for 30 frames

LI A0 -1 ; Player Index (Current Player)
LI A1 4 ; Animation Index (Dizzy)
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2

LI A0 4 ; Assigns Happening fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Message) ; This loads "Message" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL GetRandomByte
NOP

LI T0 4
DIVU V0 T0
MFHI T1
LI T2 2
MULT T1 T2
MFLO T1
ADDIU S0 T1 4

; Give the player the coins
MOVE A0 S1
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S0

; Display the coin change by the player stats
MOVE A0 S1
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
SUBU A1 R0 S0

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30

LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW RA 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

.align 16
Message:
.ascii "A blast of ice from the"
.byte 0x06
.ascii " Ice Flowers"
.byte 0x08,0x0A
.ascii "made you"
.byte 0x03
.ascii " lose coins"
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; Exclamation Mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; FF=Pause (THIS ALWAYS GOES AT THE END)

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black Font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red Font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple Font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green Font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow Font
; .byte 0x08 ; White Font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation Mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question Mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New Line (Writes Below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; - (minus)
; .byte 0x3E ; x (multiply)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; FF=Pause

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for picture

Star Bits.code:
; NAME: Star Bits
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)

; S0 = Coins to Gain
; S1 = Current Player Index

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S1 V0

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Message) ; This loads "Message" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL GetRandomByte
NOP

LI T0 4
DIVU V0 T0
MFHI T1
LI T2 2
MULT T1 T2
MFLO T1
ADDIU S0 T1 3

BEQZ S1 CheckP1
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S1 T0 CheckP2
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ S1 T0 CheckP3
NOP

LUI T1 hi(0x800CD099)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800CD099)
LBU T2 0(T1)
ADDU S0 S0 T2
SB R0 0(T1)
J GiveCoins
NOP

CheckP1:
LUI T1 hi(0x800CD096)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800CD096)
LBU T2 0(T1)
ADDU S0 S0 T2
SB R0 0(T1)
J GiveCoins
NOP

CheckP2:
LUI T1 hi(0x800CD097)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x800CD097)
LBU T2 0(T1)
ADDU S0 S0 T2
SB R0 0(T1)
J GiveCoins
NOP

CheckP3:
LUI T1 hi(0x800CD098)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(0x00CD098)
LBU T2 0(T1)
ADDU S0 S0 T2
SB R0 0(T1)
J GiveCoins
NOP

GiveCoins:
; Give the player the coins
MOVE A0 S1
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S0

; Display the coin change by the player stats
MOVE A0 S1
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S0

JAL HappyAnimation
NOP

; Sleep for 30 frames to let coin change take effect
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40

LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW RA 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

.align 4
HappyAnimation:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE A0 V0
LUI T1 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_char) ; Load Player 1's Character address
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Character address
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by T0
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to T0

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get current Player's Character address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load Character value into T0

ADDIU V0 T0 0x2BE ; Mario's Happy Voice
; Character voices are their "character value" distance away from
; Mario's, e.g. Luigi's character value = 1, so Luigi's happy voice
; is 1 away from Mario's

JAL PlaySound
MOVE A0 V0
; Visit the following link to get SFX Indexes:
; https://pastebin.com/H1jxNFqr

LI A0 -1 ; Load Current Player Index
LI A1 5 ; Animation Index (Joy)
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0 ; Do not loop animation

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

.align 16
Message:
.ascii "You"
.byte 0x5C
.ascii "ve got a lot of"
.byte 0x04
.ascii " Star Bits"
.byte 0x08
.ascii " over there"
.byte 0xC2,0x0A
.ascii "Let me trade you for my"
.byte 0x07
.ascii " coins"
.byte 0x08,0xC2 ; Exclamation Mark (!)
.byte 0xFF,0 ; FF=Pause (THIS ALWAYS GOES AT THE END)

; Here's a list of the most common bytes you'll need
; .byte 0x01 ; Black Font
; .byte 0x03 ; Red Font
; .byte 0x04 ; Purple Font
; .byte 0x05 ; Green Font
; .byte 0x06 ; Blue font
; .byte 0x07 ; Yellow Font
; .byte 0x08 ; White Font
; .byte 0x85 ; Period (.)
; .byte 0xC2 ; Exclamation Mark (!)
; .byte 0xC3 ; Question Mark (?)
; .byte 0x82 ; Comma (,)
; .byte 0x0A ; New Line (Writes Below)
; .byte 0x5C ; Apostrophe (')
; .byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
; .byte 0x3D ; - (minus)
; .byte 0x3E ; x (multiply)
; .byte 0xFF,0 ; FF=Pause

; If your message has an image, use this at the start of each line
; .byte 0x1A,0x1A,0x1A,0x1A ; Padding for picture

Launch Star.code:
; NAME: Launch Star
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Space
; PARAM: Space|Dest1
; PARAM: Space|Dest1Next
; PARAM: Space|Dest1Prev
; PARAM: Space|Dest2
; PARAM: Space|Dest2Next
; PARAM: Space|Dest2Prev
; PARAM: Space|Dest3
; PARAM: Space|Dest3Next
; PARAM: Space|Dest3Prev
; PARAM: Space|Dest4
; PARAM: Space|Dest4Next
; PARAM: Space|Dest4Prev
; PARAM: +Number|ClosestStar

ADDIU SP SP -56
SW RA 52(SP)
SW S0 48(SP)
SW S1 44(SP)
SW S2 40(SP)
SW S3 36(SP)
SW S4 32(SP)

; S0 = Prompt
; S1 = Current Player Index
; S2 = AI Choice
; S3 = Dest X Coords
; S4 = Dest Y Coords

LUI T0 hi(0x800CD09D)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD09D)
LB T1 0(T0)
BNEZ T1 exit
NOP

LI A0 -1
LI A1 -1
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2

LI A0 -1
LI A1 10
JAL 0x800ED20C
LI A2 Space

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S1 V0
MOVE A0 S1
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 5

BEQZ V0 NoCoins
NOP

START:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195

SW R0 20(SP) ; A4
SW R0 24(SP) ; A5
SW R0 28(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; No image
LUI A1 hi(Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Prompt)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
J AILogic
NOP
AISelect:
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 S2 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 yes
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 no
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 view_map
NOP

view_map:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J START
NOP

yes:
MOVE A0 S1
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 -5

MOVE A0 S1
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 -5

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x12C ; Transform

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(YesMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(YesMessage) ; This loads "Message" into the Textbox
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LI A0 2 ; Assigns star fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x154 ; Launch Star sound

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20

JAL GetRandomByte
NOP
LI T0 4
DIVU V0 T0
MFHI T1
BEQZ T1 Destination1
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ T0 T1 Destination2
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ T0 T1 Destination3
NOP

MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest4_chain_index
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest4_chain_space_index

MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest4Next_chain_index
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest4Next_chain_space_index

MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest4Prev_chain_index
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest4Prev_chain_space_index

JAL GetSpaceData
LI A0 Dest4

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; This gets the X pos of the space
LW V1 0(V0) 
MOVE S3 V1 ; Copy to S6

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; This gets the Y pos of the space
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE S4 V1 ; Copy to S7

J SetCoords
NOP

Destination1:
MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest1_chain_index
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest1_chain_space_index

MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest1Next_chain_index
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest1Next_chain_space_index

MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest1Prev_chain_index
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest1Prev_chain_space_index

JAL GetSpaceData
LI A0 Dest1

ADDIU V0 V0 8
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE S3 V1

ADDIU V0 V0 8
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE S4 V1

J SetCoords
NOP

Destination2:
MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest2_chain_index
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest2_chain_space_index

MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest2Next_chain_index
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest2Next_chain_space_index

MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest2Prev_chain_index
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest2Prev_chain_space_index

JAL GetSpaceData
LI A0 Dest2

ADDIU V0 V0 8
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE S3 V1

ADDIU V0 V0 8
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE S4 V1

J SetCoords
NOP

Destination3:
MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest3_chain_index
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest3_chain_space_index

MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest3Next_chain_index
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest3Next_chain_space_index

MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A1 R0 Dest3Prev_chain_index
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Dest3Prev_chain_space_index

JAL GetSpaceData
LI A0 Dest3

ADDIU V0 V0 8
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE S3 V1

ADDIU V0 V0 8
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE S4 V1

SetCoords:
JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Player Struct at V0
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player

LW V1 0x24(V0) ; Load Offset 24 into V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; Add 0xC to get current player's X Coords
SW S3 0(V1) 

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; This should load current player's Y Coords
SW S4 0(V1)

LI A0 2 ; Assigns star fade-out
JAL InitFadeIn ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(SentMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SentMessage) ; This loads "Message" into the Textbox
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LUI T0 hi(0x800CD09D)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD09D)
LI T1 1
SB T1 0(T0)

J exit
NOP

no:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195 ; Luma cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(NoMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NoMessage) ; This loads "Message" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
J exit
NOP

NoCoins:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195 ; Luma cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(NoCoinsMessage)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NoCoinsMessage) ; This loads "Message" into the Textbox
LI A2 0x0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0x0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

exit:
LW S0 48(SP)
LW S1 44(SP)
LW S2 40(SP)
LW S3 36(SP)
LW S4 32(SP)
LW RA 52(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 56

.align 16
NoCoinsMessage:
.ascii "If you don"
.byte 0x5C
.ascii "t have"
.byte 0x03
.ascii " 5 coins"
.byte 0x08,0x82
.ascii " I can"
.byte 0x5C
.ascii "t"
.byte 0x0A
.ascii "send you to another space"
.byte 0x85
.byte 0xFF,0

.align 16
NoMessage:
.ascii "Well"
.byte 0x82
.ascii " if you ever need to fast travel"
.byte 0x82,0x0A
.ascii "you can count on us"
.byte 0x07
.ascii " Lumas"
.byte 0x08,0xC2
.byte 0xFF,0

.align 16
Prompt:
.byte 0x0B
.ascii "If you want to fast travel"
.byte 0x82,0x0A
.ascii "you"
.byte 0x5C
.ascii "ve come to the right place"
.byte 0xC2
.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.ascii "I can transform into a"
.byte 0x07
.ascii " Launch Star"
.byte 0x08,0x0A
.ascii "and send you to another"
.byte 0x0A,0x07
.ascii "Luma Space"
.byte 0x08,0xC2
.ascii " Want to try"
.byte 0xC3
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A ; Little more for option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "Sure"
.byte 0x82
.ascii " send me away"
.byte 0xC2
.byte 0x1A,0x1A
.byte 0x29 ; Coin icon
.byte 0x3E ; x (multiply)
.ascii " 5"
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A ; Little more for option indent
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "No thanks"
.byte 0x82
.ascii " I"
.byte 0x5C
.ascii "ll walk"
.byte 0x85
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0x0A,0x1A,0x1A 
.byte 0x0C ; Start option
.ascii "View map"
.byte 0x0D ; End option
.byte 0

.align 16
YesMessage:
.ascii "Okay"
.byte 0x82
.ascii " here we go"
.byte 0xC2,0x0A
.ascii "TRANSFOOOOOORM"
.byte 0xC2,0xC2,0xC2,0xC2
.byte 0xFF,0

.align 16
SentMessage:
.ascii "The"
.byte 0x07
.ascii " Launch Star"
.byte 0x08
.ascii " sent you to another space"
.byte 0xC2
.byte 0xFF,0

.align 4
AILogic:
LUI T0 hi(0x800CD05D)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD05D) ; Address of current Star Spawn Cycle
ADDIU T1 T0 1 ; Address of first Star Spawn Index in the Cycle
LBU T0 0(T0)
ADDU T0 T0 T1 ; Add to get address of current Star Spawn Index
LBU T2 0(T0) ; Load current Star Spawn Index to T2 (0-7)

LI T0 ClosestStar ; 0-7
BEQ T0 T2 SayNo
NOP

LI T0 0
BEQ T0 T2 SayYes
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ T0 T2 SayYes
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ T0 T2 SayYes
NOP
LI T0 4
BEQ T0 T2 SayYes
NOP
LI T0 7
BEQ T0 T2 SayYes
NOP

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50

BEQZ V0 SayNo
NOP

SayYes:
LI S2 0
J AISelect
NOP

SayNo:
LI S2 1
J AISelect
NOP

Red Luma.code:
; NAME: Red Luma
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Space

ADDIU SP SP -72 ; Aligned by 8 to avoid N64 crash
SW RA 68(SP)
SW S0 36(SP)
SW S1 40(SP)
SW S2 44(SP)
SW S3 48(SP)
SW S4 52(SP) ; Current Player's Index
SW S5 56(SP) ; Opponent #1
SW S6 60(SP) ; Opponent #2
SW S7 64(SP) ; Opponent #3

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1  8 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 Space ; Space Index to face towards

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

START:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195

JAL GetPlayerStrings
NOP

SW T2 16(SP) ; A4
SW T0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (None)
LUI A1 hi(Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Prompt)
MOVE A2 V0
JAL ShowMessage
MOVE A3 V1

J AIChoice
NOP
AISelection:
LI A0 0x2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision

MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

JAL CloseMessage
NOP

LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 player1
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 player2
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 player3
NOP
LI A0 3
BEQ S0 A0 player4
NOP

JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP

J START
NOP

player1:
BEQZ S4 PickAgain
NOP
LI S5 0
J StartFade
NOP

player2:
LI S5 1
BEQ S4 S5 PickAgain
NOP
J StartFade
NOP

player3:
LI S5 2
BEQ S4 S5 PickAgain
NOP
J StartFade
NOP

player4:
LI S5 3
BEQ S4 S5 PickAgain
NOP
J StartFade
NOP

PickAgain:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195

SW R0 16(SP)
SW R0 20(SP)
SW R0 24(SP)
LI A0 -1
LUI A1 hi(AgainPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(AgainPrompt)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J START
NOP

StartFade:
LI A0 2 ; Circle Fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; 16 Frames of Fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 19 ; Sleep 19 Frames

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x154 ; Warp noise

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Sleep 20 Frames

LUI T1 hi(p1_cur_chain_index)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_cur_chain_index)
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Chain Adresses
MULT S5 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by T0
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to T0

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Player's Current Chain address
LBU S0 0(T1) 

ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load Current Space Address
LBU S1 0(T1) 

ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load Next Space Chain Address
LBU S2 0(T1)

ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load Next Space Address
LBU S3 0(T1)

ADDIU T1 T1 3 ; Load Previous Space Chain Address
LBU S6 0(T1)

ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load Previous Space Address
LBU S7 0(T1)

LUI T1 hi(p1_cur_chain_index)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_cur_chain_index)
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Chain Adresses
MULT S4 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by T0
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to T0
ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Player's Current Chain address

SB S0 0(T1) ; Store other player's chain index to the current player
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load current player's space address
SB S1 0(T1) 
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load current player's next chain address
SB S2 0(T1)
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load current player's next space address
SB S3 0(T1)
ADDIU T1 T1 3 ; Load current player's previous chain address
SB S6 0(T1)
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load current player's previous space address
SB S7 0(T1)

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Player Struct at V0
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
MOVE S5 V0

MOVE A0 S0
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Gets True Space Index at V0
MOVe A1 S1

JAL GetSpaceData ; Pointer to Space Data at V0
MOVE A0 V0

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; This gets the X pos of the space
LW V1 0(V0) 
MOVE T0 V1 ; Copy to T0

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; This gets the Y pos of the space
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE T1 V1 ; Copy to T1

LI T2 0x41200000 ; Float value for 10?
MTC1 T2 F2 ; Move Float to F1?
MTC1 T1 F4 ; Move Space Y Pos float to F1?
ADD.S F6 F2 F4 ; Add the floats for maximum floatiness
MFC1 T1 F6 ; Move total to T1?

LW V1 0x24(S5) ; Load Offset 24 into V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; Add 0xC to get current player's X Coords
SW T0 0(V1) 

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; This should load current player's Y Coords
SW T1 0(V1)

LI A0 2 ; Circle Fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; 16 Frames of Fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 36 ; Sleep 36 Frames

JAL HappyAnimation
NOP

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 40

LW RA 68(SP)
LW S0 36(SP)
LW S1 40(SP)
LW S2 44(SP)
LW S3 48(SP)
LW S4 52(SP)
LW S5 56(SP)
LW S6 60(SP)
LW S7 64(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 72

.align 4
HappyAnimation:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE A0 V0
LUI T1 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_char) ; Load Player 1's Character address
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Character address
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get current Player's Star address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into S2

ADDIU V0 T0 0x2BE ; Mario's Despair Index

JAL PlaySound
MOVE A0 V0
NOP

LI A0 -1 ; Player Index (Current Player)
LI A1 5 ; Animation Index (Star)
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 32

.align 4
GetPlayerStrings:
ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

LUI T1 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_char) ; Load Player 1's Character address
LBU T0 0(T1)
ADDIU V0 T0 0x1C00 ; MARIO String

ADDIU T1 T1 0x38 ; Load Player 2's Character Address
LBU T0 0(T1)
ADDIU V1 T0 0x1C00 ; MARIO String

ADDIU T1 T1 0x38 ; Load Player 3's Character Address
LBU T0 0(T1)
ADDIU T2 T0 0x1C00 ; MARIO String

LBU T0 0(T1)
ADDIU T0 T0 0x1C00 ; MARIO String

LW RA 28(SP)
JR RA

.align 16

.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.byte 0x1A,0x1A ; Little more for option indent

.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.byte 0x1A,0x1A ; Little more for option indent

.byte 0x0A ; Newline
.byte 0x1A,0x1A ; Little more for option indent

NOP

Ice Flower Blockade.code:
; NAME: Ice Flower Blockade
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Next
; PARAM: Space|Prev

ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)
SW S3 28(SP)

LI A0 -1
LI A1 -1
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player Index at V0
NOP
MOVE S3 V0

;BEGIN ITEM SELECTION PROMPT==========================================
START:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 
LUI A1 hi(Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Prompt)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
J AILogic
NOP
AISelect:
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 payitem
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 paycoins
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 exit
NOP
LI A0 3
BEQ S0 A0 view_map
NOP
;END ITEM SELECTION PROMPT============================================
view_map:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J START
NOP
;BEGIN Item Values====================================================
; 0x00 = Mushroom
; 0x01 = Skeleton Key
; 0x02 = Poison Mushroom
; 0x03 = Reverse Mushroom
; 0x04 = Cellular Shopper
; 0x05 = Warp Block
; 0x06 = Plunder Chest
; 0x07 = Bowser Phone
; 0x08 = Dueling Glove
; 0x09 = Lucky Lamp
; 0x0A = Golden Mushroom
; 0x0B = Boo Bell
; 0x0C = Boo Repellant
; 0x0D = Bowser Suit
; 0x0E = Magic Lamp
; 0x0F = Koopa Card
; 0x10 = Barter Box
; 0x11 = Lucky Coin
; 0x12 = Wacky Watch
;END Item Values======================================================

payitem:
LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

item1check:
BEQ S0 S3 checkslots1
NOP

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J item1check
NOP

checkslots1:
LI S0 0x01
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 paykey
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 paykey
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 paykey
NOP

J failedcheck
NOP

paykey:
LI S0 0xFF ; S0 contains Empty Value
SB S0 0(S1) ; Place Empty Value into last-checked slot (Skeleton Key)

JAL FixUpPlayerItemSlots
MOVE A0 S3

JAL RefreshHUD
MOVE A0 S3

J SetPath
NOP

failedcheck:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1
LUI A1 hi(nonemsg)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(nonemsg)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J START
NOP

paycoins:
LI A0 -1
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 10

BEQZ V0 Nocoins
NOP

MOVE A0 S3
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual ; Adjusts the player's coins
LI A1 -10

MOVE A0 S3
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange ; Shows the +coins effect
LI A1 -10

JAL SleepProcess ; Waits 30 frames for game to show coin change
LI A0 30

J SetPath
NOP

SetPath:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1
LUI A1 hi(yesmsg)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(yesmsg)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LI A0 11 ; Assigns star fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

LI A0 -1
ADDIU A1 R0 Next_chain_index
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
ADDIU A2 R0 Next_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1
ADDIU A1 R0 Next_chain_index
JAL SetNextChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Next_chain_space_index

LI A0 -1
ADDIU A1 R0 Prev_chain_index
JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace
ADDIU A2 R0 Prev_chain_space_index

JAL GetSpaceData
LI A0 Next

ADDIU V0 V0 8
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE S3 V1

ADDIU V0 V0 8
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE S4 V1

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Player Struct at V0
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player

LW V1 0x24(V0) ; Load Offset 24 into V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; Add 0xC to get current player's X Coords
SW S3 0(V1) 

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; This should load current player's Y Coords
SW S4 0(V1)

LI A0 11 ; Assigns star fade-out
JAL InitFadeIn ; Fade to black
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Sleep for 16 frames

J exit
NOP

Nocoins:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1
LUI A1 hi(nocoinsmsg)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(nocoinsmsg)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J START
NOP

exit:
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
LW S3 28(SP)
LW RA 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

.align 16
Prompt:
.byte 0x0B
.ascii "The"
.byte 0x06
.ascii " Ice Flowers"
.byte 0x08
.ascii " are dancing"
.byte 0x82,0x0A
.ascii "blocking the road"
.byte 0x85
.ascii "They might let you pass"
.byte 0x0A 
.ascii "if you give them something"
.byte 0x85,0x0A
.byte 0x0C,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Give them a"
.byte 0x06
.ascii " Skeleton Key"
.byte 0x08,0x85
.byte 0x0D,0x0A
.byte 0x0C,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Give them"
.byte 0x03
.ascii " 10 coins"
.byte 0x08,0x85
.byte 0x0D,0x0A
.byte 0x0C,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "Leave them to dance on their own"
.byte 0x85,0x0D,0x0A
.byte 0x0C,0x1A,0x1A
.ascii "View map"
.byte 0x0D
.byte 0

.align 16
nonemsg:
.ascii "You don"
.byte 0x5C
.ascii "t have a"
.byte 0x06
.ascii " Skeleton Key"
.byte 0x08,0x85
.byte 0xFF,0

.align 16
nocoinsmsg:
.ascii "You don"
.byte 0x5C
.ascii "t have enough"
.byte 0x07
.ascii " coins"
.byte 0x08,0x85
.byte 0xFF,0

.align 16
yesmsg:
.ascii "The"
.byte 0x06
.ascii " Ice Flowers"
.byte 0x08
.ascii " graciously let you by"
.byte 0x85
.byte 0xFF,0

.align 4
AILogic:
LUI T0 hi(0x800CD05D)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x800CD05D) ; Address of current Star Spawn Cycle
ADDIU T1 T0 1 ; Address of first Star Spawn Index in the Cycle
LBU T0 0(T0)
ADDU T0 T0 T1 ; Add to get address of current Star Spawn Index
LBU S4 0(T0) ; Load current Star Spawn Index to T2 (0-7)

LI T0 5 ; 0-7
BEQ T0 S4 SayNo
NOP
LI T0 6
BEQ T0 S4 SayNo
NOP

LI S0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI S1 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item1) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's First Item

loop:
BEQ S0 S3 endloop
NOP

ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's First Item
J loop
NOP

endloop:
LI S0 0x01
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 usekey
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 usekey
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1
LBU S2 0(S1)
BEQ S0 S2 usekey
NOP

MOVE A0 S3
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A0 10

BEQZ V0 SayNo
NOP

LI T0 4
BEQ S4 T0 SelectCoins
NOP

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50

BEQZ V0 SelectCoins
NOP
SayNo:
LI V0 2
J AISelect
NOP

usekey:
LI V0 0
J AISelect
NOP

SelectCoins:
LI V0 1
J AISelect
NOP

Luma Shop (Icecap).code:
; NAME: Luma Shop (Icecap)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Space

;====================================================================
; IMPORTANT: This code is specifically designed to allow the landing
;            or passing player to purchase an item from an inventory
;            of your choice. If the player's inventory is full, they
;            don't get to buy anything.
;===================================================================

ADDIU SP SP -120
SW RA 116(SP)
SW S0 112(SP)
SW S1 108(SP)
SW S2 104(SP)
SW S3 100(SP)
SW S4 96(SP)
SW S5 92(SP)
SW S6 88(SP)
SW S7 84(SP)

LI A0 -1
LI A1 -1
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 2

LI A0 -1 ; Current Player's Index
LI A1 10 ; Frames it takes to turn
JAL 0x800ED20C ; RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 Space ; Space Index to face towards

;BEGIN Checks that prevent purchase===================================
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; Current Player's Index at V0
NOP

MOVE S4 V0 ; Copy Current Player Index to S4

LUI S1 hi(p1_item3)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_item3) ; Load Player 1's Item slot #3 address
LI T0 0x38 ; This is the distance between each player's Item #3
MULT S4 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU S1 S1 T0 ; Add result to get current Player's item slot #3
LBU S2 0(S1) ; Load address value into S2

LI T0 0xFF ; No Item Value
BNE S2 T0 TooManyItems ; If the player's inventory is full, exit
NOP
;END Checks that prevent purchase=====================================

;BEGIN GREETING=======================================================
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1
LUI A1 hi(Greeting_Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Greeting_Message)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
;END GREETING=========================================================

;BEGIN ITEM SELECTION PROMPT==========================================
START:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1
LUI A1 hi(ItemSelection_Prompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ItemSelection_Prompt)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; Get the selection, either from the player or CPU.
; If A0 is a pointer to AI data, AI logic is ran to pick for CPUs.
; If A0 is 0 or 1, the 0th or 1st option is chosen by CPUs.
; If A0 is 2, then the value of A1 is the CPUs option index choice.
J AILogic
NOP
AISelect:
LI A0 2
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
MOVE A1 V0 ; A1 now has the AI's decision
MOVE S0 V0 ; S0 now has the chosen option index

; Obligatory message box closing/cleanup calls.
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Change the player's destination based on the choice.
LI A0 0
BEQ S0 A0 item1
NOP
LI A0 1
BEQ S0 A0 item2
NOP
LI A0 2
BEQ S0 A0 item3
NOP
LI A0 3
BEQ S0 A0 item4
NOP
LI A0 4
BEQ S0 A0 item5
NOP
LI A0 5
BEQ S0 A0 item6
NOP
LI A0 6
BEQ S0 A0 item7
NOP
LI A0 7
BEQ S0 A0 item8
NOP
LI A0 8
BEQ S0 A0 exit
NOP
LI A0 9
BEQ S0 A0 view_map
NOP
;END ITEM SELECTION PROMPT============================================

;BEGIN Item Values====================================================
; 0x00 = Mushroom
; 0x01 = Skeleton Key
; 0x02 = Poison Mushroom
; 0x03 = Reverse Mushroom
; 0x04 = Cellular Shopper
; 0x05 = Warp Block
; 0x06 = Plunder Chest
; 0x07 = Bowser Phone
; 0x08 = Dueling Glove
; 0x09 = Lucky Lamp
; 0x0A = Golden Mushroom
; 0x0B = Boo Bell
; 0x0C = Boo Repellant
; 0x0D = Bowser Suit
; 0x0E = Magic Lamp
; 0x0F = Koopa Card
; 0x10 = Barter Box
; 0x11 = Lucky Coin
; 0x12 = Wacky Watch

item1:

LI S3 5 ; S3 contains Mushroom Price
LI S5 0
J payprice
NOP
item2:

LI S5 0
J payprice
NOP
item3: ; Comet Medal

LI S0 2
J payprice
NOP
item4: ; 10 Star Bits

LI S0 2
J payprice
NOP
item5: ; 20 Star Bits

LI S3 10 ; S3 containes Boo Bell Price
LI S0 2
J payprice
NOP

NOP

NOP

view_map:

NOP
J START
NOP
;END Item Values======================================================

;BEGIN Checking Player For Necessary Coins To Purchase================
payprice:
MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index moved to A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
MOVE A1 S3 ; Amount of coins to check

BEQZ V0 NotEnoughCoins ; If insufficient funds, branch
NOP
;END Checking Player For Necessary Coins To Purchase==================

;BEGIN Taking Coins From Player=======================================
MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index moved to A0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
SUBU A1 R0 S3 ; Amount to pay

MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index moved to A0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
SUBU A1 R0 S3 ; Amount to display

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30

LI T0 2
BEQ S0 T0 resume
NOP
;END Taking Coins From Player=========================================

;BEGIN Checking Player Item Slots=====================================
LI T1 2
SUBU S1 S1 T1 ; This loads the current player's first Item address
LBU S2 0(S1) ; Load slot #1's Item Value into S2
LI T1 0xFF ; No Item Value
BEQ S2 T1 giveitem ; Go to giveitem if the slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to load current player's second Item address
LBU S2 0(S1) ; Load slot #2's Item Value into S2
BEQ S2 T1 giveitem ; Go to giveitem if the slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to load current player's third Item address

giveitem:
SB S0 0(S1)
;END Checking Player Item Slots=======================================

NOP

PickAgain:

SW R0 24(SP)

StartFade:
LI A0 2 ; Circle Fade-out
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; 16 Frames of Fade-out

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 19 ; Sleep 19 Frames

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x154 ; Warp noise

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; Sleep 20 Frames

LUI T1 hi(p1_cur_chain_index)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_cur_chain_index)
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Chain Adresses
MULT S5 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by T0
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to T0

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Player's Current Chain address
LBU S0 0(T1) 

ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load Current Space Address
LBU S1 0(T1) 

ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load Next Space Chain Address
LBU S2 0(T1)

ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load Next Space Address
LBU S3 0(T1)

ADDIU T1 T1 3 ; Load Previous Space Chain Address
LBU S6 0(T1)

ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load Previous Space Address
LBU S7 0(T1)

JAL ReverseFix
MOVE A0 S4

BEQZ V0 continuered
NOP
MOVE S2 S6
MOVE S3 S7

continuered:
LUI T1 hi(p1_cur_chain_index)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_cur_chain_index)
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Chain Adresses
MULT S4 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by T0
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to T0
ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Player's Current Chain address

SB S0 0(T1) ; Store other player's chain index to the current player
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load current player's space address
SB S1 0(T1) 
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load current player's next chain address
SB S2 0(T1)
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load current player's next space address
SB S3 0(T1)
ADDIU T1 T1 3 ; Load current player's previous chain address
SB S6 0(T1)
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; Load current player's previous space address
SB S7 0(T1)

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; Player Struct at V0
LI A0 -1 ; Current Player
MOVE S5 V0

MOVE A0 S0
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; Gets True Space Index at V0
MOVe A1 S1

JAL GetSpaceData ; Pointer to Space Data at V0
MOVE A0 V0

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; This gets the X pos of the space
LW V1 0(V0) 
MOVE T0 V1 ; Copy to T0

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; This gets the Y pos of the space
LW V1 0(V0)
MOVE T1 V1 ; Copy to T1

LI T2 0x41200000 ; Float value for 10?
MTC1 T2 F2 ; Move Float to F1?
MTC1 T1 F4 ; Move Space Y Pos float to F1?
ADD.S F6 F2 F4 ; Add the floats for maximum floatiness
MFC1 T1 F6 ; Move total to T1?

LW V1 0x24(S5) ; Load Offset 24 into V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; Add 0xC to get current player's X Coords
SW T0 0(V1) 

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; This should load current player's Y Coords
SW T1 0(V1)

LI A0 2 ; Circle Fade-in
JAL InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; 16 Frames of Fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 36 ; Sleep 36 Frames

J finish
NOP

paystars:

LUI S1 hi(p1_stars)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_stars) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's Stars

STARTcheckstar:
BEQ T0 S4 checkstar 
NOP

ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU S1 S1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's Stars
J STARTcheckstar
NOP

checkstar:

SLTI T0 S2 2
NOP

NOP
LI T1 2
SUBU S2 S2 T1
SB S2 0(S1)

NOP

BEQZ S4 bluee
NOP

BEQ S4 T2 redd
NOP

NOP
LI T2 3

NOP

NOP

NOP

AILogic:
LI T0 0x0 ; Start with Player 1 
LUI T1 hi(p1_stars)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_stars) ; S1 is the address of Player 1's Stars

STARTcheckAIstar:
BEQ T0 S4 checkAIstar 
NOP

ADDIU T0 T0 1 ; Add 1 to check the next Player
ADDIU T1 T1 0x38 ; This makes it load the next Player's Stars
J STARTcheckAIstar
NOP
;FIND CURRENT PLAYER END---------------------------------------------

;GIVE STAR START-----------------------------------------------------
checkAIstar:
LB T2 0(T1) ; Load Player's Star count into S2

SLTI T0 T2 2
NOP
BNEZ T0 CheckCoins
NOP
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
MOVE A0 S4

BNEZ V0 CheckCoins
NOP
JAL GetRandomByte
NOP
SLTI T0 V0 0x55
NOP
BNEZ T0 SelectLife
NOP
SLTI T0 V0 0x110
NOP
BNEZ T0 Select1UP
NOP

CheckCoins:

JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 5

BEQZ V0 SelectExit
NOP

MOVE A0 S4 ; Copy Current Player Index to A0
JAL PlayerHasCoins
LI A1 10 ; A1 = The minimum amount of Coins to shop

BEQZ V0 FiveChoice ; If the player doesn't have the Coins, exit
NOP

JAL GetRandomByte
NOP

SLTI T2 V0 0x25
NOP

BNEZ T2 SelectKey

BNEZ T2 SelectTwenty

NOP
BNEZ T2 SelectRed

SLTI T2 V0 0xCC

1-Up Mushroom.code:
; NAME: 1-Up Mushroom
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -48
SW RA 44(SP)
SW S0 40(SP)
SW S1 36(SP)
SW S2 32(SP)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S0 V0
BEQZ S0 CheckP1
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ S0 T0 CheckP2
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ S0 T0 CheckP3
NOP

LUI T0 hi(p4_coins)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(p4_coins)
LHU T1 0(T0)
BNEZ T1 exit
NOP
LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A0)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A0)
LB S2 0(S1)
ANDI T4 S2 8

BEQZ T4 exit
NOP

XORI S2 S2 8
SB S2 0(S1)

J Activate
NOP

CheckP1:
LUI T0 hi(p1_coins)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(p1_coins)
LHU T1 0(T0)
BNEZ T1 exit
NOP
LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A0)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A0)
LB S2 0(S1)
ANDI T4 S2 1

BEQZ T4 exit
NOP

XORI S2 S2 1
SB S2 0(S1)

J Activate
NOP

CheckP2:
LUI T0 hi(p2_coins)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(p2_coins)
LHU T1 0(T0)
BNEZ T1 exit
NOP
LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A0)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A0)
LB S2 0(S1)
ANDI T4 S2 2

BEQZ T4 exit
NOP

XORI S2 S2 2
SB S2 0(S1)

J Activate
NOP

CheckP3:
LUI T0 hi(p3_coins)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(p3_coins)
LHU T1 0(T0)
BNEZ T1 exit
NOP
LUI S1 hi(0x800CD0A0)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(0x800CD0A0)
LB S2 0(S1)
ANDI T4 S2 4

BEQZ T4 exit
NOP

XORI S2 S2 4
SB S2 0(S1)

Activate:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1
LUI A1 hi(msg)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(msg)
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x18

MOVE A0 S0
JAL AdjustPlayerCoins
LI A1 100

MOVE A0 S0
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 100

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE A0 V0
LUI T1 hi(p1_char)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_char) ; Load Player 1's Character address
LI T0 0x38 ; Distance between each player's Character address
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by S3
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to S3

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get current Player's Star address
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into S2

ADDIU V0 T0 0x2BE ; Mario's Despair Index

JAL PlaySound
MOVE A0 V0

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30

exit:
LW S0 40(SP)
LW S1 36(SP)
LW S2 32(SP)
LW RA 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 48

.align 16
msg:
.ascii "The"
.byte 0x05
.ascii " 1"
.byte 0x3D
.ascii "Up Mushroom"
.byte 0x08
.ascii " activated"
.byte 0xC2
.byte 0xFF,0

Reset Launch Flag.code:
; NAME: Reset Launch Flag
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -8
SW RA 4(SP)

LUI T0 hi(0x800CD09D)

LI T1 0
SB T1 0(T0)

LW RA 4(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 8

Green Luma.code:
; NAME: Green Luma
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Space
; PARAM: Space|CurrentSpace

ADDIU SP SP -32
SW RA 28(SP)

LI A0 -1
LI A1 10
JAL 0x800ED20C
LI A2 Space

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x195 ; Luma cry

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI A0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
; Visit the following link to get the full list of Character Images
; https://github.com/PartyPlanner64/PartyPlanner64/wiki/Displaying-Messages
; If you use a character image, check the bottom of the code
LUI A1 hi(Message)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Message) ; This loads "Message" into the Textbox
LI A2 0
JAL ShowMessage
LI A3 0

; The rest here perform the "wait for confirmation"
; and probably messagebox teardown.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL CloseMessage
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LI A0 2 ; Assigns Happening fade-in
JAL InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; Assigns 16 frames of fade-in

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; Sleep for 16 frames

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x123 ; 19? 16B? 1F6? 1FB?

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE A0 V0
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
NOP
BEQZ V0 FirstPlace
NOP
LI T0 1
BEQ V0 T0 SecondPlace
NOP
LI T0 2
BEQ V0 T0 ThirdPlace
NOP

JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 40
BNEZ V0 GetStar
NOP
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50
BNEZ V0 GetCoin
NOP
J GetItem
NOP

FirstPlace:
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 40
BNEZ V0 GetCoin
NOP
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 25
BNEZ V0 GetStar
NOP
J GetItem
NOP

SecondPlace:
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 30
BNEZ V0 GetStar
NOP
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50
BNEZ V0 GetCoin
NOP
J GetItem
NOP

ThirdPlace:
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 30
BNEZ V0 GetItem
NOP
JAL RNGPercentChance
LI A0 50
BNEZ V0 GetCoin
NOP
J GetStar
NOP

GetStar:
LI T0 CurrentSpace
LUI T1 hi(hidden_block_star_space_index)

SB T0 0(T1)

NOP

;CHECK ITEM SLOTS START----------------------------------------------
checkslots:
LI T0 0xFF ; 0xFF = No Item Value
LBU T2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the first slot
BEQ T0 T2 Continue ; Go to itemmessage if the first slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check Slot #2
LBU T2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the second slot
BEQ T0 T2 Continue ; Go to itemmessage if the second slot is empty
NOP
ADDIU S1 S1 1 ; Add 1 to check Slot #3
LBU T2 0(S1) ; S2 is the value of the item in the third slot
BEQ T0 T2 Continue ; Go to itemmessage if the third slot is empty
NOP
